mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NTC_NO DESC) RNUM, NTC_NO, NTC_TITLE, NTC_WRTR, NTC_WRT_DT FROM NOTICE WHERE NTC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR NTC_WRTR LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{currentPage} - 1) * 10) + 1 AND (#{currentPage} * 10)

SELECT A.*, CASE WHEN A.RNUM <= 3 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS RECENT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO DESC) RNUM, N.* FROM ( SELECT NTC_NO, NTC_TITLE, NTC_CONTS, NTC_WRTR, NTC_WRT_DT FROM NOTICE WHERE 1 = 1
AND NTC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND NTC_CONTS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY NTC_NO DESC ) N ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10) - (10 - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * 10)

SELECT A.NTC_NO, A.NTC_TITLE, A.NTC_CONTS, A.NTC_WRTR, A.NTC_WRT_DT, A.NTC_MDFCN_DT, A.ATCH_FILE_NO, B.FILE_SN, B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, B.FILE_STRE_COURS, B.STRE_FILE_NM, B.FILE_THUM_YN, B.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, B.FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE FROM notice A, ATCH_FILE B WHERE A.atch_file_no = B.atch_file_no(+) AND A.NTC_NO = #{ntcNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NTC_TITLE = #{ntcTitle}, NTC_CONTS = #{ntcConts}, NTC_MDFCN_DT = SYSDATE, ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo} WHERE NTC_NO = #{ntcNo}
mapper.select: select * from NOTICE order by NTC_NO

select A.NTC_NO, A.NTC_TITLE, A.NTC_CONTS, A.NTC_WRTR, A.NTC_WRT_DT, A.NTC_MDFCN_DT, A.ATCH_FILE_NO, B.ATCH_FILE_NO, B.FILE_SN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, B.FILE_STRE_COURS, B.STRE_FILE_NM, B.FILE_THUM_YN, B.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, B.FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE from notice A, ATCH_FILE B WHERE A.atch_file_no = B.atch_file_no(+) and A.NTC_NO = #{ntcNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R, N.* FROM (SELECT NTC_NO, NTC_TITLE, NTC_CONTS, NTC_WRTR, NTC_WRT_DT FROM NOTICE WHERE 1 = 1
AND NTC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND NTC_CONTS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY NTC_NO DESC )N )

SELECT * from (select NTC_NO, LEAD(NTC_NO,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO) AS next, LAG(NTC_NO,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO) AS last, NTC_TITLE, LEAD(NTC_TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO) AS nextTitle, LAG(NTC_TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO) AS lastTitle, NTC_WRT_DT, CAST(LEAD(NTC_WRT_DT, 1, TO_DATE('99990101', 'YYYYMMDD')) OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO) AS DATE) AS nextDay, CAST(LAG(NTC_WRT_DT, 1, TO_DATE('99990101', 'YYYYMMDD')) OVER(ORDER BY NTC_NO) AS DATE) AS lastDay FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NTC_NO DESC) WHERE NTC_NO = #{ntcNo}
